languages.text: "Отлично умеешь давить на больное. Даже слишком". {n}Соломон угрюмо смотрит в сторону плаца, где очередной заключенный встречает смерть.{/n}
"You have a way of hitting a nerve. I'd say you are too good at it." {n}Solomorne looks sullenly at the courtyard, where yet another prisoner is about to meet his fate.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Отлично умеешь давить на больное. Даже слишком". {n}Соломон угрюмо смотрит в сторону плаца, где очередной заключенный встречает смерть.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You have a way of touching a raw and painful nerve." {n}Solomorne looks sullenly at the courtyard where yet another prisoner is about to meet his fate.{/n}
"You have a way of touching a raw and painful nerve." {n}Solomorne looks sullenly at the courtyard where yet another prisoner is about to meet his fate.{/n}
"You have a way of touching a raw and painful nerve." {n}Solomorne looks sullenly at the courtyard, where yet another prisoner is about to meet his fate.{/n}

"You have a way of hitting a nerve. I'd say you are too good at it." {n}Solomorne looks sullenly at the courtyard, where yet another prisoner is about to meet his fate.{/n}
"You have a way of hitting a nerve. I'd say you are too good at it." {n}Solomorne looks sullenly at the courtyard, where yet another prisoner is about to meet his fate.{/n}

languages.text: 「お前は人の神経を逆なでするのが得意だな。あまりにも上手すぎる」{n}ソロモーンは沈んだ表情で中庭を見つめる。そこではまた別の囚人が運命を迎えようとしていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have a way of hitting a nerve. I'd say you are too good at it." {n}Solomorne looks sullenly at the courtyard, where yet another prisoner is about to meet his fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前は人の神経を逆なでするのが得意だな。あまりにも上手すぎる」{n}ソロモーンは沈んだ表情で中庭を見つめる。そこではまた別の囚人が運命を迎えようとしていた。{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr habt das Talent, immer den Nerv zu treffen. Ich würde sagen, Ihr seid zu gut darin." {n}Solomorne blickt missmutig auf den Hof, wo einen weiteren Gefangenen sein Schicksal erwartet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have a way of hitting a nerve. I'd say you are too good at it." {n}Solomorne looks sullenly at the courtyard, where yet another prisoner is about to meet his fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt das Talent, immer den Nerv zu treffen. Ich würde sagen, Ihr seid zu gut darin." {n}Solomorne blickt missmutig auf den Hof, wo einen weiteren Gefangenen sein Schicksal erwartet.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous savez où appuyer pour toucher un point sensible. Vous vous y prenez un peu trop bien, même. » {n}Solomorne jette un regard maussade en direction de la cour, où un autre prisonnier est sur le point de rendre son dernier soupir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have a way of hitting a nerve. I'd say you are too good at it." {n}Solomorne looks sullenly at the courtyard, where yet another prisoner is about to meet his fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez où appuyer pour toucher un point sensible. Vous vous y prenez un peu trop bien, même. » {n}Solomorne jette un regard maussade en direction de la cour, où un autre prisonnier est sur le point de rendre son dernier soupir.{/n}

languages.text: «Usted sí que sabe poner el dedo en la llaga. Incluso diría que se le da demasiado bien». {n}Solomorne dirige una mirada hosca al patio, donde hay otro prisionero a punto de afrontar su destino.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have a way of hitting a nerve. I'd say you are too good at it." {n}Solomorne looks sullenly at the courtyard, where yet another prisoner is about to meet his fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Usted sí que sabe poner el dedo en la llaga. Incluso diría que se le da demasiado bien». {n}Solomorne dirige una mirada hosca al patio, donde hay otro prisionero a punto de afrontar su destino.{/n}

languages.text: “你真是哪壶不开提哪壶。我得说，你真的很擅长这个。”{n}索罗蒙面色阴沉地看着院子，在那里，另一位囚犯即将面对他的命运。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have a way of hitting a nerve. I'd say you are too good at it." {n}Solomorne looks sullenly at the courtyard, where yet another prisoner is about to meet his fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你真是哪壶不开提哪壶。我得说，你真的很擅长这个。”{n}索罗蒙面色阴沉地看着院子，在那里，另一位囚犯即将面对他的命运。{/n}

languages.text: "İnsanların damarına basmasını iyi biliyorsun. Hatta bunda biraz fazla iyisin bile diyebilirim." {n}Solomorne, kasvetli bir şekilde bir başka mahkûmun daha kaderiyle yüzleşmek üzere olduğu bahçeye bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have a way of hitting a nerve. I'd say you are too good at it." {n}Solomorne looks sullenly at the courtyard, where yet another prisoner is about to meet his fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İnsanların damarına basmasını iyi biliyorsun. Hatta bunda biraz fazla iyisin bile diyebilirim." {n}Solomorne, kasvetli bir şekilde bir başka mahkûmun daha kaderiyle yüzleşmek üzere olduğu bahçeye bakar.{/n}
